system_summary: This system provides AI-powered code analysis, debugging, and automated code fixing capabilities, accessible via a command-line interface or a web dashboard, leveraging external large language models and a persistent knowledge base.

components.label: CLI
components.role: Allows users to interact with the system and trigger code analysis and fixing operations directly from their terminal.
components.visual_3d_object: A dark, translucent command-line interface terminal window with green text scrolling.
components.visual_label: Floating clearly above it, a flat holographic text label reading 'CLI' in bold white sans-serif font.

components.label: Web Dashboard
components.role: Provides a user-friendly graphical interface for configuring, monitoring, and interacting with the code analysis and autofixing processes.
components.visual_3d_object: A glowing, minimalist browser window displaying a clean dashboard layout with charts and code snippets.
components.visual_label: Floating clearly above it, a flat holographic text label reading 'WEB DASHBOARD' in bold white sans-serif font.

components.label: API Backend
components.role: Serves as the central processing unit, exposing APIs for the CLI and Web Dashboard, orchestrating analysis, debugging, and fix generation.
components.visual_3d_object: A sleek, metallic server rack with pulsating blue light indicators, representing core processing.
components.visual_label: Floating clearly above it, a flat holographic text label reading 'API BACKEND' in bold white sans-serif font.

components.label: AI Orchestrator
components.role: Manages interactions with external Large Language Models, including caching, context building, and routing requests for code generation and analysis.
components.visual_3d_object: A crystalline, multi-faceted brain-like structure with neural pathways subtly glowing.
components.visual_label: Floating clearly above it, a flat holographic text label reading 'AI ORCHESTRATOR' in bold white sans-serif font.

components.label: Static Analyzers
components.role: Executes various static code analysis tools (e.g., Pylint, Bandit) to identify potential issues and vulnerabilities in the provided codebase.
components.visual_3d_object: A set of interconnected, spinning gears with a magnifying glass hovering over them, symbolizing detailed inspection.
components.visual_label: Floating clearly above it, a flat holographic text label reading 'ANALYZERS' in bold white sans-serif font.

components.label: Knowledge Base DB
components.role: Stores and retrieves code analysis results, historical fixes, known patterns, and contextual information to inform the autofixing process.
components.visual_3d_object: A stack of glowing, transparent data disks, contained within a secure, geometric vault.
components.visual_label: Floating clearly above it, a flat holographic text label reading 'KNOWLEDGE BASE DB' in bold white sans-serif font.

components.label: External LLM Service
components.role: Represents the external Large Language Model (e.g., Google Gemini) that provides advanced code understanding, generation, and fixing capabilities.
components.visual_3d_object: A distant, swirling nebula of data, hinting at vast computational power beyond the system's local boundary.
components.visual_label: Floating clearly above it, a flat holographic text label reading 'EXTERNAL LLM' in bold white sans-serif font.
